name: HackCell
description:
111% Simple Tower Defence
Find the best & strongest unit!

Simple, but addictive strategy defence game.

More Features
◆ Link two color generators to spawn stronger units.
◆ My unique army VS army of various enemies…. who will win?
◆ Top ranker if you meet 300 wave boss !!!!
◆ Simple UI, cool animation effects, colorful units

Enjoy the addictive “HackCell” while commuting to work, in the bus or subway, waiting at the bank.
Whenever, wherever “HackCell” is ready for action!!!!
Thank you!
